name: PC 8001 MK 2 SR
keyboard: 83-key typewriter style, with 5 function keys and a numeric keypad
sound: 3 FM channels, 3 PSG channels. Same as PC-8801FE (YM2203)
ports: Tape recorder, Printer, Serial RS232C, Floppy drives (PC-80S31), Digital RGB, B/W CRT, Audio Line Output
description:
The PC-8001 MKII SR was the last one of PC-8001 Series. In 1985, PC-8801 series took the place of the PC-8001 series along with a large amount of available software, so this computer didn't meet a large success. 

This machine displayed not only Katakana but also Hiragana characters, a Kanji-ROM was available as optional extra.
